actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide notice to any taxpayer of amounts withheld in excess of such amounts reported on a tax return by such taxpayer.

summary.text: Amends administrative provisions of the Internal Revenue Code to require the Secretary of the Treasury to notify a taxpayer if information returns show at least $5 more tax withheld than is shown on the taxpayer's tax return.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide notice to any taxpayer of amounts withheld in excess of such amounts reported on a tax return by such taxpayer.
